validationRules.scarSec: Required when countdownSelection='scarcity' - seconds remaining as string (e.g., '90')
validationRules.counterMaxWidth: For style-2 only - responsive max width for flip countdown
validationRules.initNum: For fake counter - starting number as string
validationRules.endNum: For fake counter - ending number as string
validationRules.numRange: For fake counter - max random change amount per interval
validationRules.changeInterval: For fake counter - seconds between changes
validationRules.fenaLoop: For fake counter - boolean, restart when reaching endNum
validationRules.fMsg: For fake counter - message template with {visible_counter} placeholder
validationRules.templates: Pro: Template ID to show when countdownExpiry='showtemp'
validationRules.enaLoop: Pro: Boolean, restart countdown after delayTime seconds
validationRules.delayTime: Pro: Delay in seconds before loop restart (e.g., '604800' for 7 days)
validationRules.trackUdata: Pro: 'normal' (no tracking), 'cookie', or 'ip' - prevents reset on page refresh
validationRules.showLabels: Boolean - true shows time unit labels (Days, Hours, etc.)
validationRules.daysText/hoursText/minutesText/secondsTe: Custom labels for time units - can translate or abbreviate
validationRules.inlineStyle: Boolean - true displays countdown horizontally inline, false stacks vertically
validationRules.counterTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable number typography
validationRules.labelTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable label typography
validationRules.expiryMsgTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable expiry message typography
validationRules.backendVisi: Boolean - true shows countdown in editor, false shows placeholder

warnings: datetime format MUST be ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) - wrong format breaks countdown
countdownSelection determines which attributes work: 'normal' uses datetime, 'scarcity' uses scarSec, 'fake' uses initNum/endNum/changeType
style-2 (flip) requires flipTheme ('dark' or 'light') to display correctly
counterMaxWidth only works with style-2 (flip countdown) - ignored by style-1 and style-3
Scarcity mode (scarSec) counts down from specified seconds and RESTARTS on page reload by default unless trackUdata is set (Pro)
Fake counter with fenaLoop:true loops forever - set to false for one-time countdown
expiryRedirect requires FULL URL (https://example.com/page) not relative (/page) for external redirects
countdownExpiry='showtemp' requires Pro version and valid template ID - free version use 'showmsg' or 'redirect'
enaLoop and trackUdata are PRO features - will be ignored in free version
delayTime is in SECONDS (604800 = 7 days, 86400 = 1 day, 3600 = 1 hour)
For fake counter, endNum must be > initNum for 'increasing' or < initNum for 'decreasing'
fMsg placeholder {visible_counter} MUST be included to show the dynamic number
openTypography:1 required before setting counterTypo/labelTypo/expiryMsgTypo - otherwise typography ignored
inlineStyle:true good for embedding in text, false (stacked) better for hero sections
backendVisi:true shows live countdown in editor, false shows static placeholder - use true for previewing
Circular progress (style-3) works best with inlineStyle:true - takes up more horizontal space
commonMistakes: Using relative date format ('2025-12-31') without time - MUST include time (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)
Forgetting to set countdownExpiry - countdown reaches zero but nothing happens
Setting enaLoop without delayTime - countdown restarts immediately with no delay
Using trackUdata without understanding it's Pro - free users see default behavior
Not setting flipTheme on style-2 - flip countdown may not display correctly
Using counterMaxWidth on style-1 or style-3 - attribute only works for style-2
Setting both datetime and scarSec - only one is used based on countdownSelection
Forgetting {visible_counter} in fMsg - fake counter number won't display
Using string 'true' instead of boolean true for booleans - breaks conditionals
Not enabling openTypography:1 before setting fontSize/fontWeight - typography won't apply
Setting numRange too high for fake counter - numbers jump unrealistically
Using scarSec without scarcity mode - attribute ignored unless countdownSelection='scarcity'
Expecting scarcity to persist across sessions without trackUdata (Pro feature)
Setting expiryRedirect without setting countdownExpiry='redirect' - redirect won't trigger
Using templates (showtemp) in free version - requires Pro
bestPractices: **Datetime Format:** Always use full ISO 8601 with timezone offset (e.g., '2025-12-31T23:59:59+00:00') for UTC or local time
**Style Selection:** Use style-1 for versatile general purpose, style-2 for premium events, style-3 for modern minimalist designs
**Expiry Actions:** Always set countdownExpiry - use 'showmsg' for announcements, 'redirect' for automatic navigation, 'showtemp' (Pro) for custom content
**Scarcity Timing:** 60-120 seconds works best for urgency - too long reduces FOMO, too short causes frustration
**Fake Counter Range:** Keep numRange under 5-10 for realistic increments - large jumps look suspicious
**Custom Labels:** Abbreviate for mobile (D/H/M/S instead of Days/Hours/Minutes/Seconds) to save space
**Typography Scale:** Counter 36-56px, labels 10-14px for balanced hierarchy
**Color Psychology:** Red/orange for urgency (flash sales), blue/green for events, purple for premium launches
**Inline vs Stacked:** Use inlineStyle:true for headers/paragraphs, false for hero sections and featured countdowns
**Loop Delay:** For weekly sales, use delayTime:604800 (7 days), monthly use 2592000 (30 days)
**User Tracking:** Use trackUdata:'cookie' for better UX (persists across sessions), 'ip' for stricter control (Pro)
**Accessibility:** Ensure counterFontColor contrasts with background (4.5:1 ratio WCAG AA)
**Mobile Optimization:** Test responsive fontSize values - countdown should be readable but not overwhelming on small screens
**Backend Preview:** Set backendVisi:true when building to see live countdown in editor, false for static placeholder
**Redirect URLs:** Test expiryRedirect.url before launch - broken redirects hurt conversion
**Fake Counter Messages:** Use {visible_counter} creatively: 'ðŸ”¥ {visible_counter} watching now', 'Only {visible_counter} left', '{visible_counter} people joined today'
**Event Timing:** Set datetime 5-10 minutes before actual event start for buffer time
**Sales Deadlines:** Place countdown above fold near CTA button for maximum urgency
**A/B Testing:** Test different scarSec values (60s vs 120s) to find optimal urgency without frustration

accessibilityNotes: **Color Contrast:** Ensure counterFontColor has 4.5:1 contrast ratio with background for WCAG AA
**Dynamic Content:** Countdown updates every second - ensure screen readers can announce changes
**Expiry Message:** expiryMsg is announced by screen readers - make it descriptive ('Sale Started!' not just '!')
**Label Clarity:** Use full words for labels (Days not D) unless space is very limited - helps screen readers
**Keyboard Navigation:** Countdown is not interactive, no keyboard focus needed
**Motion Sensitivity:** Flip animation (style-2) may trigger vestibular disorders - provide option to disable animations
**ARIA Labels:** Plugin should add aria-live regions for countdown updates
**Time Format:** Consider adding 'remaining' to context ('5 Days Remaining' vs just '5 Days')
**Multiple Countdowns:** If using multiple on one page, ensure each has unique context/purpose
**Auto-redirect Warning:** If using countdownExpiry='redirect', provide warning text so users aren't surprised by redirect
performanceConsiderations: **JavaScript Intervals:** Countdown runs on setInterval (1000ms) - minimal performance impact
**Style-2 Performance:** Flip animation uses CSS3 transforms - hardware accelerated, performant
**Style-3 SVG:** Circular progress renders as lightweight SVG - scales perfectly, small file size
**Cookie Storage:** trackUdata='cookie' stores small timestamp in browser - negligible storage
**Lazy Loading:** Place countdowns above fold for immediate visibility, below fold for less critical timers
**Multiple Countdowns:** Limit to 2-3 per page to avoid excessive JavaScript intervals
**Backend Preview:** backendVisi:true loads full countdown in editor - may slow editor slightly
**Fake Counter Interval:** Use changeInterval:5+ seconds for fake counters - faster intervals increase CPU usage
**Expiry Actions:** redirect triggers immediate navigation (no delay), showtemp loads template (may have slight delay)
**Responsive Images:** If using images near countdown, lazy load below fold for faster above-fold render
integrationPatterns: **Product Launch Hero:** Place style-2 flip countdown in tp-container hero section with tp-heading and tp-button CTA
**Flash Sale Banner:** Use scarcity countdown in sticky header tp-row with urgent messaging and shop button
**Event Registration:** Combine style-1 countdown with tp-form-block for deadline-driven signups
**Pricing Tables:** Add small countdown above tp-pricing-table to show offer expiration
**Sidebar Widgets:** Use compact style-3 circular countdown in sidebar with abbreviated labels
**Email Campaigns:** Set datetime to email send time + 48 hours for limited-time email offers
**Cart Abandonment:** Use scarcity countdown (scarSec:600 for 10 minutes) to encourage checkout completion
**Course Enrollment:** Place countdown above enrollment button with redirect to sold-out page on expiry
**Webinar Registration:** Use flip countdown with expiryRedirect to webinar room URL at start time
**Social Proof:** Integrate fake counter near tp-testimonials ('ðŸ”¥ {visible_counter} joined this week')
